title: Understanding the Type of Analysis
text: When measuring the amount of a specific substance, like vitamin C, in a sample, consider whether you are determining the presence or the quantity.

title: Qualitative vs. Quantitative Analysis
text: Qualitative analysis identifies the presence of a substance, while quantitative analysis measures the amount of the substance present.

title: Focus on Measurement
text: Since the task is to measure the amount of vitamin C, think about which type of analysis involves measurement.

title: Choosing the Correct Analysis Type
text: Given the options: qualitative, quantitative, characterization, and fundamental, which one involves measuring the amount of a substance?
